title: Nintendo Switch Sales Pass 100 Million! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.03.22
description:
Greg- I mean... Blessing and Tim host a jam-packed KFGD! Let's talk about Nintendo Switch Sales, GameStop NFTs, and Spy Fox.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:25 - Housekeeping
00:05:00 - Nintendo Switch Passes 100m Sold
00:07:07 - Nintendo Cuts Switch Outlook
00:11:53 - Top 10 Switch Games Still Dominated by kart
00:15:55 - Pokémon Legends: Arceus May Be On Track To Be Second Fastest-Selling Switch Game
00:32:35 - Also from that Bloomberg report
00:38:17 - Ads
00:39:23 - Nintendo Interested in NFTs.. NOT
00:43:08 - GameStop Launching NFT Marketplace
00:46:20 - Tim Schafer Round-Up
00:52:59 - OlliOlli World Review Round-up
00:59:43 - Tiny Tina’s Gone Gold
00:59:56 - Phil Spencer getting lifetime Achievement Award at DICE
01:01:01 - Out today
01:03:47 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Gabe Patillo
